items.title: Social surface capture
items.description: E-001: Enable capturing contacts from LinkedIn, X (Twitter), and Reddit profiles. Core functionality for the extension.

items.title: Attio authentication and API interaction
items.description: E-002: Handle OAuth/API key authentication with Attio and implement API calls for person creation.

items.title: Transparent feedback and errors
items.description: E-003: Provide clear, non-blocking success and error feedback to users.

items.title: Duplicate handling
items.description: E-004: Detect existing contacts in Attio and inform users without creating duplicates. Resolve before write pattern.

items.title: Extension settings and inspection
items.description: E-005: Settings page showing auth status, permissions, and data usage transparency.

items.title: Optional hosted service integration
items.description: E-006: Optional integration with hosted services for usage limits. Core functionality must work without this.

items.title: Add LinkedIn profile to Attio
items.description:
US-001: As a user, I can add a LinkedIn profile to Attio from the page I am viewing.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I am on a LinkedIn profile, When I invoke the extension action, Then visible name, profile URL, and headline are captured
- No background requests occur before action

items.title: Add X profile to Attio
items.description:
US-002: As a user, I can add an X profile to Attio.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I am on an X profile, When I invoke capture, Then username, display name, and profile URL are captured

items.title: Add Reddit user profile to Attio
items.description:
US-003: As a user, I can add a Reddit user profile to Attio.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I am on a Reddit user page, When I invoke capture, Then username and profile URL are captured

items.title: Authenticate extension with Attio
items.description:
US-004: As a user, I can authenticate the extension with Attio.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I have not authenticated, When I attempt capture, Then I am prompted to authenticate
- No data is sent without auth

items.title: Create person records in Attio
items.description:
US-005: As a user, captured people are created in Attio.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given valid auth and input, When capture succeeds, Then a person record exists in Attio with source URL

items.title: Immediate success feedback
items.description:
US-006: As a user, I receive immediate success feedback.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given a successful capture, Then a non-blocking confirmation is shown
- Confirmation disappears automatically

items.title: Clear error feedback
items.description:
US-007: As a user, I see clear errors when capture fails.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given a failure, Then the error reason is shown
- No retry occurs automatically

items.title: Duplicate detection notification
items.description:
US-008: As a user, I am informed if a person already exists.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given the person exists in Attio, When I attempt capture, Then I am notified without creating a duplicate

items.title: View permissions and data usage
items.description:
US-009: As a user, I can view permissions and data usage.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I open settings, Then permissions and data handling are documented locally

items.title: Opt-in hosted service usage limits
items.description:
US-010: As a power user, I can opt into usage limits managed by a hosted service.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given I opt in, Then usage limits are enforced
- Core capture still functions without the service

items.title: Fix popup state display mismatch with badge
items.description: Bug: Popup shows 'Add to Attio' button even when badge shows green (person exists). The popup state doesn't match the badge state, causing confusion about whether a person is already in Attio.
